unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Always a gamble, like playing Teen Patti during Diwali! Farmers in Maharashtra are saying premiums are too high. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana payouts were delayed in Bihar too. My uncle, Kishanlal from UP, got peanuts after his sugarcane crop failed. Hope things improve soon! Else everyone will be eating just biryani this Onam, no rice! Rs. 5000 per acre is a LOT.
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Always a gamble, like playing Teen Patti during Diwali! Farmers in Maharashtra are saying premiums are too high. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana payouts were delayed in Bihar too. My uncle, Kishanlal from U P, got peanuts after his sugarcane crop failed. Hope things improve soon! Else everyone will be eating just biryani this Onam, no rice! Rupee five thousand per acre is a lot.
